definition: the act of slowing down or falling behind, cover with lagging to prevent heat loss
details:
noun
- the act of slowing down or falling behind
= synonyms: slowdown
- one of several thin slats of wood forming the sides of a barrel or bucket
= synonyms: stave
- the time between one event, process, or period and another
= synonyms: meanwhile, meantime, interim
verb
- cover with lagging to prevent heat loss
= example: cover with lagging to prevent heat loss
- throw or pitch at a mark, as with coins
- hang (back) or fall (behind) in movement, progress, development, etc.
= synonyms: fall back, fall behind, dawdle
- lock up or confine, in or as in a jail
= synonyms: remand
